Documentation.long_help: Takes points from a vtkPolyData with associated poly lines in cell data and builds a polygonal tube around that line with some specified radius and number of sides.
Documentation.short_help: Takes points from a vtkPolyData with associated poly lines in cell data and builds a polygonal tube around that line with some specified radius and number of sides.

IntVectorProperty.name: OutputDataSetType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property determines the dataset type for the output of the programmable filter.

StringVectorProperty.name: Script
StringVectorProperty.default_values:
pdi = self.GetInput() # VTK PolyData Type pdo = self.GetOutput() # VTK PolyData Type
pdo.DeepCopy(pdi)
# Make a tube from the PolyData line: tube = vtk.vtkTubeFilter() tube.SetInputData(pdo) tube.SetRadius(Radius) tube.SetNumberOfSides(Number_of_Sides) tube.Update() pdo.ShallowCopy(tube.GetOutput())
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains the text of a python program that the programmable source runs.
